mapper.select: select NUM, MEMBERRANK, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL from MEMBER order by NAME asc

select NUM, MEMBERRANK, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL from MEMBER where cast(NUM as char) like '%'#{searchWord}'%' or MEMBERRANK like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or NAME like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or PHONE like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or EMAIL like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER(NUM, MEMBERRANK, NAME, PHONE, EMAIL) values(#{num}, #{memberRank}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email})
